title: LinkTokenCreateRequestCreditPartnerInsights
description: Specifies options for initializing Link for use with the Credit Partner Insights product.

days_requested.description: The maximum integer number of days of history to compute Credit Partner Insights. Defaults to 180 if not specified

prism_products.description: The specific Prism products to return. If none are passed in, then all products will be returned.

items.title: PrismProduct
items.description: The Prism products that can be returned by the Plaid API
